Package org.thewhitemage13.processor

Class MediaProcessorImpl

java.lang.Object
org.thewhitemage13.processor.MediaProcessorImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
MediaProcessorInterface
@Component public class MediaProcessorImpl extends Object implements MediaProcessorInterface
Implementation of the MediaProcessorInterface for managing media files on Amazon S3.

This class provides methods for uploading, deleting, and generating URLs for media files stored in an S3 bucket. It also handles generating unique file names for uploaded files using UUIDs.

Key Features:

  • Uploads files to Amazon S3 with a specified key.
  • Deletes files from Amazon S3 using a unique key.
  • Generates a publicly accessible URL for files stored in S3.
  • Generates a unique file name based on a UUID for the given MultipartFile.
Version:
1.0.0
Author:
Mukhammed Lolo

  • Method Details

    • uploadFileToS3

      public void uploadFileToS3(String key, org.springframework.web.multipart.MultipartFile file) throws IOException
      Uploads a file to Amazon S3 using the specified key.

      This method uploads the provided MultipartFile to the configured S3 bucket, using the specified key to uniquely identify the file.

      Specified by:
      uploadFileToS3 in interface MediaProcessorInterface
      Parameters:
      key - the unique key for the file in the S3 bucket
      file - the MultipartFile to be uploaded
      Throws:
      IOException - if an error occurs while uploading the file

    • deleteFileFromS3

      public void deleteFileFromS3(String key)
      Deletes a file from Amazon S3 using the specified key.

      This method removes the file from the S3 bucket corresponding to the provided key.

      Specified by:
      deleteFileFromS3 in interface MediaProcessorInterface
      Parameters:
      key - the unique key of the file to be deleted

    • generateS3Url

      public String generateS3Url(String key)
      Generates a publicly accessible URL for a file stored in Amazon S3.

      This method constructs a URL to access the file stored in the configured S3 bucket using the specified key.

      Specified by:
      generateS3Url in interface MediaProcessorInterface
      Parameters:
      key - the unique key of the file stored in S3
      Returns:
      a URL that can be used to access the file

    • generateFileName

      public String generateFileName(org.springframework.web.multipart.MultipartFile file)
      Generates a unique file name based on a UUID and the original file name.

      This method creates a file name by combining a randomly generated UUID with the original file name, ensuring that the file name is unique.

      Specified by:
      generateFileName in interface MediaProcessorInterface
      Parameters:
      file - the MultipartFile for which to generate a file name
      Returns:
      a unique file name based on the UUID and the original file name
